dcterms:creator: B. G. Fabian Caba Heilbron
Victor Escorcia
J. C. Niebles
dcterms:description: A large-scale video benchmark for human activity understanding, consisting of a set of 20,000 videos totaling 849 hours of video with a total of 100,000 descriptions, each with its start and end timestamp.
dcterms:title: ActivityNet Captions

dcterms:creator: J. Xu
T. Mei
T. Yao
Y. Rui
dcterms:description: A large video description dataset for bridging video and language, providing short video segments and their corresponding annotations in the form of captions.
dcterms:title: MSR-VTT

dcterms:creator: X. Wang
J. Wu
J. Chen
L. Li
Y.-F. Wang
W. Y. Wang
dcterms:description: A large-scale, high-quality multilingual dataset for video-and-language research, designed to facilitate the study of video captioning across different languages.
dcterms:title: VATEX
